transcript.text:
￼












Appendix
Glossary of Terms

15 min
on this page, you can find an alphabetical list of words that you may come across while using our help portal, or hear when people talk about the web to print industry a a additional options additional options additional options in the print industry refer to the property or options other than the basic characteristics associated with the product for example, you have a business card product and you want to offer some extra features with the original product such as corner type, lamination type, color preferences, etc admin markup % admin markup % admin markup percentage is an amount that the admin charges when the actual order fulfillment is done by a vendor here, he defines the product price, vendor price, and a markup % for self, which calculates the final product price art layout art layout various layouts for art/graphics were created using the ‘custom art maker’ add on plugin customers can use these arts to personalize their products this feature is only available when the ‘custom art maker’ add on plugin is enabled artwork artwork in print industry, an artwork is defined as a print ready file with all the product specifications that can be used by a commercial printer to print the final product attributes attributes the values associated with the additional options are called attributes in other terms, attributes are the variants of additional options example for the 'lamination' additional option, 'matte', 'glossy', 'spot uv', etc are its attributes b b blind shipping blind shipping it refers to the shipping method where the end customers or the receivers are unaware of the sender or the shipper c c customer/users customer/users a customer/user is a person or company that buys products/services from your website or business d d default store default store it's the onprintshop b2c front store that you get by default whenever you purchase any of the onprintshop plans designer studio designer studio it is our in house easy to use online designing tool through this one can design various products like stationery, promotional, wide format, canvas, calendar, etc technical expertise is not required to use this tool h h help templates help templates it is a design guide for the customers it generally contains instructions regarding product margins safe margin, trim margin, and bleed margin available in the designer studio canvas j j job job a job in ops is referred to as the action to fulfill/complete the order received m m mailing product mailing product the product in which the mailing service (via the 'mailing & fulfillment' add on plugin) is enabled is referred to as 'mailing product' o o offline order offline order offline orders are those orders which are placed by the admin on behalf of their customers from the admin panel generally, this option is for orders received via phone, walk in, or email onprintshop store/web store onprintshop store/web store the onprintshop store or web store is referred to as the storefront through which you offer your products/services to your end customers p p pdf block template pdf block template it's a type of pdf template, in which the blocks/element's positions and sometimes also the element's properties like font type, size, etc are predefined and non customizable this facility is a part of the 'pdf block templates' add on plugin printer printer the printer here are the print vendors to whom you will assign the print orders for products printer branch printer branch the print branch generally refers to one of the many locations from where the store owner may be allowed to take direct orders to expand their printing business, whether through online or offline mode the main office handles the administration of your company, while the branch locations operate the business print ready file print ready file a 'print ready file' refers to a file that fulfills all of the requirements for a high resolution printed output without the need for any further modifications in simpler terms, it is the file that can be used by the printers to produce the desired job promotional products promotional products these are the products that are personalized or customized by companies/businesses with their brands and offered to customers or other businesses s s scaling factor scaling factor the scaling factor is the resize factor for the print ready file this will increase or decrease the order pdf file size according to the ratio specified this helps the customers get a scaled preview of their design without any compromise on the quality of the image shipment label shipment label a shipment label contains the details that a carrier needs to get the package from its origin to its destination it mostly includes the recipient's name, address, and a scannable barcode with a tracking number that enables the shipping partner to provide a delivery update store configuration store configuration it is the section of the admin panel that allows you to configure some general settings for your store such as languages, currencies, payment & shipping methods, and more along with third party integrations store fields store fields the store fields are the fields that are useful in designing the block templates and help in gathering an individual’s personal data these fields can be based on individual stores or specific department(s) examples of such fields can be – date of joining, blood group information on these fields can be helpful while designing identity cards storefront storefront it is the interface of your online store through which the products/services are advertised and sold w w workflow workflow a workflow is an organizational structure for managing the printing process with people having different work roles
Did this page help you?


PREVIOUS
Manage Customers
